question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. We also support payments through PayPal.

question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account dashboard. Changes will be prorated.

question: Is there a free trial available?
answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial on our Basic plan. No credit card is required to get started.
